title: John Wayne | Helltown 1937 (Western, Colorized) directed by Charles Barton | written by Zane Grey

sources.title: John Wayne | Helltown 1937 (Western, Colorized) directed by Charles Barton | written by Zane Grey
sources.description:
It took a man to win her!...But a bigger man to give her up! While exciting drama pounds at your temples, its romance will pulse through your heart! 
Based on a Zane Grey novel, this early John Wayne western stars the Duke as a carefree cowpoke Dare Rudd.  Who, to the dismay of his family, joins up with rustlers. Dare takes a shine to his cattleman cousin Tom’s girlfriend who asks Tom to hire Dare to head the big cattle drive. Dare loses the money for the drive to cardsharps, but Tom wins it back, but Dare must save Tom’s life.

Original title: Born to the West (1937) AKA: Helltown
This film is available with subtitles in many language options.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/QnK5X6YIDwc


Director: Charles Barton
Writers: Zane Grey, Stuart Anthony , Robert Yost 

Main cast:
John Wayne – Dare Rudd
Marsha Hunt – Judy Rustoe
Johnny Mack Brown – Tom Fillmore
John Patterson – Lynn Hardy
Monte Blue – Bart Hammond
Syd Saylor – Dinkey Hooley
Lucien Littlefield – Cattle Buyer

Costumes: Edith Head
Genre: Colorized, Drama, Western
Release date: 10 December 1937
Filming location: Hollywood


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
03:36 Trouble brews in a Wild West town as two men seek help from a relative, leading to unexpected confrontations and revelations.
13:53 A man named Dare visits a town and gets involved in various activities, including selling lightning rods, playing poker, and proposing marriage.
16:51 Cowboys plan to steal cattle from Fillmore, but encounter obstacles and meet new allies in Montana.
25:31 Dare is promoted to handle the cattle sale alone, despite doubts. Judy and Tom discuss Dare's capabilities and future. The cowboys prepare for the upcoming sale.
29:29 A group of cowboys embark on a journey to sell their cattle, facing challenges and encountering a skilled poker player.
36:33 A group of men stay in town to play poker, while others plan to leave but are convinced to stay by the host's hospitality.
45:48 Tom and Dare face off in a high-stakes poker game, leading to a dramatic showdown.


@CultCinemaClassics
